full_summary:
## Invitation to the Information Session on the Government of Canada’s Cloud and Hosting - Procurement Ecosystem
### Solicitation Number: GCCH2-2023

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is inviting industry players to the second information session on the Government of Canada’s Cloud and Hosting - Procurement Ecosystem. The event aims to provide additional information to vendors on the procurement ecosystem and the transition strategy.

#### Event Details

* Date: January 31, 2024
* Time: 10:00 a.m. (EST)
* Location: Virtual event (online)
* Invitation will be sent shortly to registered participants.
* Questions and feedback can be directed to: [pvrprotectedcloudarfnuageprotege@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:pvrprotectedcloudarfnuageprotege@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

#### Background

The modernization of the hosting strategy includes enhancing scalability, optimizing performance, and adapting to new technologies. SSC and Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) received numerous questions and feedback, which will be addressed during the industry session.

#### Procurement Overview

* Cloud-based services (Cloud-based software as a service, platform as a service, and infrastructure as a service) will be procured through this ecosystem.
* The procurement will follow a competitive process, with vendors invited to submit their bids.
* Selected vendors will be required to meet specific criteria for delivering cloud-based services to the Government of Canada.

#### Contact Information

For more information or to express interest in participating in the industry session, please contact:

* Enterprise IT Procurement - Approvisionnement en TI pour l'entreprise
* Email: [pvrprotectedcloudarfnuageprotege@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:pvrprotectedcloudarfnuageprotege@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 000-0000

#### Supporting Documents

* Invitation to Industry Day - Wave 2 (January 31, 2024) [Download](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30136/qa---industry-day-wave-2---jan-31.pdf)
* Industry Day - Wave 2 (January 31, 2024) [Download](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30136/industry-day-wave-2---jan-31.pdf)

Note: The rewritten entry maintains the essential details
